PrivacyViolationsSection.title: Wire tracks, shares, and monitors your data. Internxt Meet protects it.
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: Wire may be secure, but itâ€™s a nightmare for your privacy. Switch to Internxt for full security for your documents, videos, and photos. With Internxt, nobody but you can access your files, not even us.

descriptions: Wire collects account details such as email and profile name, room information, billing data for paid users, and usage, device, and analytics data like IP address and browser type. It also processes support communications and limited integration metadata. Video and audio content is not stored, except when users intentionally record meetings locally.

Wire uses cookies and thirdâ€‘party tracking technologies for analytics, advertising measurement, and improving services. These include tools from Google Analytics, Amplitude, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn. In doing so, Wire exposes personal behavior and usage patterns to multiple external companies, creating potential privacy risks and allowing data to be combined or profiled across platforms.

Wire encrypts audio and video in transit using WebRTC and TLS. Small peer-to-peer meetings use end-to-end encryption (E2EE), so only participants can access the media. In larger meetings, media is decrypted on Wireâ€™s servers and then re-encrypted for delivery. This means Wire can access unencrypted streams, so it does not provide true zero-knowledge encryption, which limits privacy.

Wire is a proprietary platform, meaning its core code is not publicly available or fully open source. Users and developers cannot inspect, modify, or independently verify the internal code that runs the service. This limits transparency and makes it harder for the community to audit security or privacy features compared with openâ€‘source alternatives.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Why you need a private alternative to Wire
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: What Wire demonstrates in security fails in terms of privacy. For full privacy, get total security combined with zero-knowledge encryption from Internxt.

descriptions: Internxt offers a full suite of privacy-focused products, including Internxt Drive, Antivirus, Cleaner, Meet and Mail. These features are not currently available with a Wire account, meaning by choosing Internxt, you get full protection and protection for your files, video calls, and data.

While Wire encrypts messages, files, and calls end-to-end, it still stores certain metadata on its servers, including account information, contact lists, timestamps, and group membership. This means Wire has access to information about who is communicating and when, even if it cannot read the content itself.

Wire doesnâ€™t include post-quantum encryption for its video calls like Internxt Meet. Without PQE, Wire puts itself behind the curve of modern security practices. Quantum computing is no longer a distant idea, and failing to prepare for its impact means user data might not stay safe forever.

WhyBestAlternativeSection.title: Why Internxt is the best alternative to Wire
WhyBestAlternativeSection.description: Internxt Drive offers a comprehensive suite of products designed to give you back control of your online privacy.

descriptions: Get increased protection with Internxt Antivirus built directly into your Internxt Drive app for full control and protection against malware. Run full or custom virus scans to keep your device running smoothly and protected against viruses such as ransomware or spyware.

Internxtâ€™s VPN protects your browsing, blocks ads and trackers, and keeps your location private. Encrypt your wifi connection to prevent spying, hackers, and identity theft. Surf securely knowing your personal information, passwords, and accounts are protected.

Internxt Cleaner helps you identify, eliminate, and manage unwanted junk or duplicate files from your device. With Cleaner, you can delete unwanted files to keep your storage organized, free from clutter, and ensure your device runs efficiently.

Internxt Meet is also available as your secure and private alternative to Wire. With Meet, you can host private video calls free from trackers, ads, and data collection. Your video calls are protected with post-quantum encryption, allowing you to host calls in total privacy.

Available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile, Internxt lets you take total control of your cloud storage by accessing your cloud from anywhere, on any device. For advanced users, Internxt offers support for WebDAV, Rclone, and NAS, offering everything you need to manage your files in total privacy.

freePlanCard.description: Get 1GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure and private alternative to Wire?
answer: Yes, Internxt uses post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption that guarantees nobody but you can view your calls. Wire manages the encryption keys on its own servers, meaning it could access your files or give access to the government or law enforcement.
Additional features such as VPN, Antivirus, Device Cleaner, Dark Web Monitor, Meet, and Mail also offer you additional protection from hackers and data breaches.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard encryption, post-quantum encryption algorithms are built to resist powerful quantum attacks, making PQE a more secure Wire alternative.
This cryptography method is used by Internxt to ensure that your lifetime cloud storage plan protects you against future cybersecurity threats and is available for all plans at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, making it a GDPR compliant cloud storage solution that follows strict laws to ensure your data and privacy are protected.

faq.question: Is Wire more expensive than Internxt?
answer: With your exclusive {{percentage}}% discount, all our plans are cheaper than Wireâ€™s pricing options currently available, with the benefit of offering many more features and privacy than Wire.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you have any more questions, requests, or need assistance, you can contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from the settings of your Internxt account if you need to add more storage. Or purchase a new plan at internxt.com/pricing with your current Internxt account, and your storage will be automatically stacked.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc). You can also pay via PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
